de.sarahw.ma.phone
Class BluetoothCommandService

java.lang.Object
  de.sarahw.ma.phone.BluetoothCommandService

public class BluetoothCommandService
extends Object

The BluetoothCommandService. Handles bluetooth connection and input/output Stream operations.

Bluetooth code adapted from https://github.com/luugiathuy/Remote-Bluetooth-Android (BluetoothCommandService.java)

Modified 2011-09-18

Author:
Luu Gia Thuy (BluetoothCommandService.java), Sarah Will (BluetoothCommandService.java modifications, additional code)

Nested Class Summary
private  class BluetoothCommandService.ConnectedThread
          This thread runs during a connection with a remote device.
private  class BluetoothCommandService.ConnectThread
          This thread runs while attempting to make an outgoing connection with a device.
